data.title: Xbox:Games with Alternate Display Modes
data.meta_description: The following is a list of Xbox games with support for high definition or enhanced definition output. The Xbox supports Enhanced Definition (480p) output and High Definition (720p and 1080i) by using an official High Definition AV Pack or third-party component component cable. Some games that lack support of the 480p resolution and 16:9 mode can be patched to support these features with tools such as OGxHD.
